db:abstract.db:para: The QPlaceSupplier class represents a supplier of a place or content associated with a place.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.6.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Each instance represents a set of data about a supplier, which can include supplier's name, url and icon. The supplier is typically a business or organization.
Note: The Places API only supports suppliers as 'retrieve-only' objects. Submitting suppliers to a provider is not a supported use case.

db:section.db:title: QPlaceIcon QPlaceSupplier::icon() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the icon of the supplier.

db:section.db:title: bool QPlaceSupplier::isEmpty() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if all fields of the place supplier are 0; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QString QPlaceSupplier::name() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the supplier which can be displayed to the user.
The name can potentially be localized. The language is dependent on the entity that sets it, typically this is the QPlaceManager. The QPlaceManager::locales() field defines what language is used.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceSupplier::setIcon(const QPlaceIcon &icon)
db:section.db:para: Sets the icon of the supplier.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceSupplier::setName(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Sets the name of the supplier.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceSupplier::setSupplierId(const QString &identifier)
db:section.db:para: Sets the identifier of the supplier.

db:section.db:title: void QPlaceSupplier::setUrl(const QUrl &url)
db:section.db:para: Sets the url of the supplier's website.

db:section.db:title: QString QPlaceSupplier::supplierId() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the identifier of the supplier. The identifier is unique to the manager backend which provided the supplier and is generally not suitable for displaying to the user.

db:section.db:title: QUrl QPlaceSupplier::url() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the URL of the supplier's website.

db:section.db:title: bool QPlaceSupplier::operator!=(const QPlaceSupplier &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this supplier is not equal to other, otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: QPlaceSupplier &QPlaceSupplier::operator=(const QPlaceSupplier &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns other to this supplier and returns a reference to this supplier.

db:section.db:title: bool QPlaceSupplier::operator==(const QPlaceSupplier &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this supplier is equal to other, otherwise returns false.
